Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Authorizes municipalities and the department of financial services to seek civil penalties for violations of the duty to maintain a foreclosed property
Summary: Authorizes municipalities and the department of financial services to seek civil penalties for violations of the duty to maintain a foreclosed property in an amount of up to $500 per day for each day such violation persists after the judgement of foreclosure has been issued.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to authorizing municipalities and the department of financial services to seek civil penalties for violations of the duty to maintain a foreclosed property
